title: No eSim feature in Google Pixel 4 XL
content:
Hello, 

I switched from Pixel 3 XL to Pixel 4 XL 
I have been using eSim on my 3XL (not Fi), by going to to network settings, add network, then choosing eSim to scan QR. my 3Xl wasn't android 10. 

in pixel 4 XL - I see no (Add network) feature. 
Phone purchased from Google Store UK
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
